ui.js

Summary
ui.js
NavbarSingleton for helping with the browser’s nav bar.
Variables
urlBarThe URL bar for the window.
TabbarSingleton for managing the tabbar of the browser.
Variables
elThe tab bar’s element.
Functions
getVisibleTabCountReturns the number of tabs that are currently visible
getAllTabsReturns an array of all tabs which exist in the current window tabbrowser.
showOnlyTheseTabsHides all of the tabs in the tab bar which are not passed into this function.
showAllTabsShows all of the tabs in the tab bar.
PageSingleton top-level UI manager.
Functions
isTabCandyVisibleReturns true if the TabCandy UI is currently shown.
hideChromeHides the nav bar, tab bar, etc.
showChromeShows the nav bar, tab bar, etc.
_setActiveTitleColorUsed on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabCandy UI.
showTabCandyZoom out of the current tab (if applicable) and show the TabCandy UI.
initStarts this object.
tabOnFocusCalled when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabCandy UI.
createGroupOnDragCalled in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabCandy UI; creates a new group based on the user’s drag.
setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.
getActiveTabReturns the currently active tab as a TabItem
UIClassSingleton top-level UI manager.
Variables
navBarA reference to the Navbar, for manipulating the browser’s nav bar.
tabBarA reference to the Tabbar, for manipulating the browser’s tab bar.
devModeIf true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.
currentTabKeeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.
Functions
initMust be called after the object is created.
_secondaryInitThis is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.
_delayInitCalled automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.
setBrowserKeyHandlerOverrides the browser’s keys for navigating between tabs (outside of the TabCandy UI), so they do the right thing in respect to groups.
advanceSelectedTabMoves you to the next tab in the current group’s tab strip (outside the TabCandy UI).
resizeUpdate the TabCandy UI contents in response to a window size change.
addDevMenuFills out the “dev menu” in the TabCandy UI.
resetWipes all TabCandy storage and refreshes, giving you the “first-run” state.
saveAllSaves all data associated with TabCandy.
saveSaves the data for this object to persistent storage
storageSanityGiven storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.
saveVisibilitySaves to storage whether the TabCandy UI is visible (as passed in).
arrangeBySiteBlows away all existing groups and organizes the tabs into new groups based on domain.
newTabOpens a new tab with the given URL.

Navbar

Singleton for helping with the browser’s nav bar.

Summary
Variables
urlBarThe URL bar for the window.

Variables

urlBar

get urlBar(
   
) { var win = Utils.getCurrentWindow(); if (win) return win.gURLBar; return null; } }

The URL bar for the window.

Tabbar

Singleton for managing the tabbar of the browser.

Summary
Variables
elThe tab bar’s element.
Functions
getVisibleTabCountReturns the number of tabs that are currently visible
getAllTabsReturns an array of all tabs which exist in the current window tabbrowser.
showOnlyTheseTabsHides all of the tabs in the tab bar which are not passed into this function.
showAllTabsShows all of the tabs in the tab bar.

Variables

el

The tab bar’s element.

Functions

getVisibleTabCount

getVisibleTabCount: function()

Returns the number of tabs that are currently visible

getAllTabs

getAllTabs: function()

Returns an array of all tabs which exist in the current window tabbrowser.  Returns an Array.

showOnlyTheseTabs

showOnlyTheseTabs: function(tabs,
options)

Hides all of the tabs in the tab bar which are not passed into this function.

Paramaters

  • An array of <BrowserTab> objects.
  • Some options

showAllTabs

showAllTabs: function()

Shows all of the tabs in the tab bar.

Page

Singleton top-level UI manager.  TODO: Integrate with UIClass.

Summary
Functions
isTabCandyVisibleReturns true if the TabCandy UI is currently shown.
hideChromeHides the nav bar, tab bar, etc.
showChromeShows the nav bar, tab bar, etc.
_setActiveTitleColorUsed on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabCandy UI.
showTabCandyZoom out of the current tab (if applicable) and show the TabCandy UI.
initStarts this object.
tabOnFocusCalled when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabCandy UI.
createGroupOnDragCalled in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabCandy UI; creates a new group based on the user’s drag.
setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.
getActiveTabReturns the currently active tab as a TabItem

Functions

isTabCandyVisible

isTabCandyVisible: function()

Returns true if the TabCandy UI is currently shown.

hideChrome

hideChrome: function()

Hides the nav bar, tab bar, etc.

showChrome

showChrome: function()

Shows the nav bar, tab bar, etc.

_setActiveTitleColor

_setActiveTitleColor: function(set)

Used on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabCandy UI.

Parameters

settrue for the special TabCandy color, false for the normal color.

showTabCandy

showTabCandy: function()

Zoom out of the current tab (if applicable) and show the TabCandy UI.

init

init: function()

Starts this object.

tabOnFocus

tabOnFocus: function(tab)

Called when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabCandy UI.

createGroupOnDrag

createGroupOnDrag: function(e)

Called in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabCandy UI; creates a new group based on the user’s drag.

setActiveTab

setActiveTab: function(tab)

Sets the currently active tab.  The idea of a focused tab is useful for keyboard navigation and returning to the last zoomed-in tab.  Hitting return/esc brings you to the focused tab, and using the arrow keys lets you navigate between open tabs.

Parameters

  • Takes a TabItem

getActiveTab

getActiveTab: function()

Returns the currently active tab as a TabItem

UIClass

Singleton top-level UI manager.  TODO: Integrate with Page.

Summary
Variables
navBarA reference to the Navbar, for manipulating the browser’s nav bar.
tabBarA reference to the Tabbar, for manipulating the browser’s tab bar.
devModeIf true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.
currentTabKeeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.
Functions
initMust be called after the object is created.
_secondaryInitThis is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.
_delayInitCalled automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.
setBrowserKeyHandlerOverrides the browser’s keys for navigating between tabs (outside of the TabCandy UI), so they do the right thing in respect to groups.
advanceSelectedTabMoves you to the next tab in the current group’s tab strip (outside the TabCandy UI).
resizeUpdate the TabCandy UI contents in response to a window size change.
addDevMenuFills out the “dev menu” in the TabCandy UI.
resetWipes all TabCandy storage and refreshes, giving you the “first-run” state.
saveAllSaves all data associated with TabCandy.
saveSaves the data for this object to persistent storage
storageSanityGiven storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.
saveVisibilitySaves to storage whether the TabCandy UI is visible (as passed in).
arrangeBySiteBlows away all existing groups and organizes the tabs into new groups based on domain.
newTabOpens a new tab with the given URL.

Variables

navBar

this.navBar

A reference to the Navbar, for manipulating the browser’s nav bar.

tabBar

this.tabBar

A reference to the Tabbar, for manipulating the browser’s tab bar.

devMode

this.devMode

If true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.  TODO: Integrate with the dev menu

currentTab

this.currentTab

Keeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.  Used to facilitate zooming down from a previous tab.

Functions

init

init: function()

Must be called after the object is created.

_secondaryInit

_secondaryInit: function()

This is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.

_delayInit

_delayInit : function()

Called automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.

setBrowserKeyHandler

_setBrowserKeyHandler : function()

Overrides the browser’s keys for navigating between tabs (outside of the TabCandy UI), so they do the right thing in respect to groups.

advanceSelectedTab

advanceSelectedTab : function(reverse,
index)

Moves you to the next tab in the current group’s tab strip (outside the TabCandy UI).

Parameters

reversetrue to go to previous instead of next
indexgo to a particular tab; numerical value from 1 to 9

resize

resize: function(force)

Update the TabCandy UI contents in response to a window size change.  Won’t do anything if it doesn’t deem the resize necessary.

Parameters

forcetrue to update even when “unnecessary”; default false

addDevMenu

addDevMenu: function()

Fills out the “dev menu” in the TabCandy UI.

reset

reset: function()

Wipes all TabCandy storage and refreshes, giving you the “first-run” state.

saveAll

saveAll: function()

Saves all data associated with TabCandy.  TODO: Save info items

save

save: function()

Saves the data for this object to persistent storage

storageSanity

storageSanity: function(data)

Given storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.

saveVisibility

saveVisibility: function(isVisible)

Saves to storage whether the TabCandy UI is visible (as passed in).

arrangeBySite

arrangeBySite: function()

Blows away all existing groups and organizes the tabs into new groups based on domain.

newTab

newTab: function(url)

Opens a new tab with the given URL.
